DescribeCaptchaResult.document: This API is used to query the result of CAPTCHA ticket verification (web and app).
DescribeCaptchaResult.name: Queries the result of CAPTCHA ticket verification (web and app).

members.document: It must be `9` here. You can configure the CAPTCHA types in the console.
members.name: CaptchaType

members.document: The user verification ticket returned by the frontend callback function
members.name: Ticket

members.document: The user public IP obtained from the customer backend server
members.name: UserIp

members.document: A random string returned by the frontend callback function
members.name: Randstr

members.document: CAPTCHA's app ID. Log in to the [Captcha console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/captcha/graphical) and you can view the CaptchaAppId in the "Key" column of the CAPTCHA list.
members.name: CaptchaAppId

members.document: CAPTCHA's app key. Log in to the [Captcha console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/captcha/graphical) and you can view the AppSecretKey in the "Key" column of the CAPTCHA list. AppSecretKey is the key for CAPTCHA ticket verification performed by the server. Please keep it confidential and do not disclose it to any third parties.
members.name: AppSecretKey

members.document: Business ID, which is used to differentiate statistical data when this service is used in multiple businesses of a website or an app.
members.name: BusinessId

members.document: Scenario ID, which is used to differentiate statistical data when this service is used in multiple scenarios of a website or an app.
members.name: SceneId

members.document: MAC address or unique identifier of a device
members.name: MacAddress

members.document: Indicates whether to return the time when the frontend obtains the CAPTCHA. Valid values: 1 (return the time) and others.
members.name: NeedGetCaptchaTime

members.document:
Status description and verification error message
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: CaptchaMsg

members.document:
This parameter returns the result of imperceptible verification. This parameter is not available for Tencent Cloud International yet.
`0`: The request is trusted.
`100`: The request is malicious.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: EvilLevel

members.document:
The timestamp when the frontend obtains the CAPTCHA.
Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: GetCaptchaTime

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
